Bitter Strike.name: Bitter Strike
Bitter Strike.flavor: So fierce is your attack that your enemy panics, ignoring your allies for one disastrous moment.
Bitter Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon
Bitter Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to all attackers until the end of your next turn.

Shattering Blow.name: Shattering Blow
Shattering Blow.flavor: Your weapon crashes into the foe, splitting it wide and leaving it gasping as its vitality sprays the air.
Shattering Blow.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Shattering Blow.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed and takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends both).
Shattering Blow.special: If the target granted combat advantage to you, it also falls prone.

Brutal Momentum.name: Brutal Momentum
Brutal Momentum.flavor: Your attacks fall with such fury that your enemy cannot possibly defend against them all.
Brutal Momentum.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with an at-will attack power using a two-handed weapon, your next attack against that enemy gains +2 power bonus to the attack roll.
